definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc

Cao Cao (155-220), famous statesman and general at the end of Han, noted poet and calligrapher, later warlord, founder and first king of Cao Wei 曹魏, father of Emperor Cao Pi 曹丕/the main villain of novel the Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义

sentences.english: Most colleges do not pay energy to promote cheerleading publicly.
sentences.chinese: 大多数高校甚至没有对啦啦操做任何宣传。

sentences.english: I want to go to a gym with aerobics.
sentences.chinese: 我要去健身房跳有氧操。

sentences.english: Fuck Nixon, I'm sure we can do better.
sentences.chinese: 操尼克松，我相信我们能做得更好。

sentences.english: Fuck the priests who put their hands down some innocent child's pants.
sentences.chinese: 操那些神父，把手伸进那些天真孩子的裤裆。

sentences.english: We are wasting our time on the meeting. The man who has the right is the boss.
sentences.chinese: 我们开会是浪费时间，决定权还是操在老板手里。

sentences.english: In Japan authority is vested in the people.
sentences.chinese: 在日本主权操在国民手里。

sentences.english: We are using the term, Halls of Amenti, in two ways.
sentences.chinese: 我们以两种格式操做“阿曼提除夜厅”阿谁术语。

sentences.english: His English was the most American-accented.
sentences.chinese: 他操的是最纯正的美国式英语。

sentences.english: A little hentai game in which you are going to fuck a cheerleader girl called Lena.
sentences.chinese: 一款小恒泰游戏，你要操啦啦队女孩叫莉娜。

sentences.english: I asked our head Sherpa, who spoke English fluently.
sentences.chinese: 我向操一口流利英语的夏巴族头人打听。
你们有有氧操的课程吗？

sentences.english: Mr. Caldwell is proficient in English and Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 高律师操流利英语和普通话。

sentences.english: An abacus is also a counting machine, using our brain and our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 算盘也是一台计数器，用人们的头脑和手指来操做。

sentences.english: It is more effective to exercise in water than on land if you want to lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 与陆上有氧操相比，水中有氧操的减肥效果更好。

sentences.english: It is more effective to exercise in water than on land if you want to lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 与陆上有氧操相比，水中有氧操的减肥效果更好。

definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
see 肏你媽|肏你妈[cao4 ni3 ma1]
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
father/daddy/"I, your father" (in anger, or out of contempt)/I (used arrogantly or jocularly)
to get panicky/to lose one's head/(coll.) (after 得) unbearably/terribly
to force (sb to do sth)/to compel/to press for/to extort/to press on towards/to press up to/to close in on/euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]
